import pandas as pd 
import datetime
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
import pyspark.sql.functions as sf
from datetime import datetime 
from datetime import date 
from datetime import timedelta
# from pyspark.sql.functions import to_date
from datetime import time
import pytz
from pathlib import Path
import pymsteams

pattoreadparquet = "abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/allcsvtoparquet/dt="
LoopCounter=1
tz = pytz.timezone('Asia/Kolkata')
todaydate = datetime.date(datetime.now(tz))
print(todaydate)
mintime = datetime.min.time()
DateList =[]
while LoopCounter <= 1 :
    DateList.append( datetime.date ( (datetime.combine(todaydate, mintime) - timedelta(days=LoopCounter)) ))
    LoopCounter += 1
DateListLength = len(DateList)
print(DateList)
TableLoopCounter = 0
DateLoopCounter = 0

location1 = pattoreadparquet   
location1= location1+ str(DateList[DateLoopCounter])+str("/")
print(location1)
df = pd.read_parquet(location1)

import pandas as pd 
import datetime
import numpy as np
from pathlib import Path
import warnings
import sys
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

New=pd.DataFrame(columns=[])
Block_df=pd.DataFrame(columns=[])
Cloud=pd.DataFrame(columns=[])
dataframe=pd.DataFrame(columns=[])
dict0={'ICR08':'Antpr1','ICR10':'Antpr1','ICR12':'Antpr1','ICR13':'Antpr1','ICR16':'Antpr2',
      'ICR17':'Antpr2','ICR18':'Antpr2','ICR19':'Antpr2','ICR01':'Antpr3','ICR02':'Antpr3',
      'ICR03':'Antpr3','ICR04':'Antpr3','ICR11':'Antpr4','ICR14':'Antpr4','ICR15':'Antpr4',
      'ICR20':'Antpr4','ICR05':'Antpr5','ICR06':'Antpr5','ICR07':'Antpr5','ICR09':'Antpr5'}
dict1={'B01':'Antpr1','B02':'Antpr2','B03':'Antpr3','B04':'Antpr4','B05':'Antpr5'}
block=['Antpr1','Antpr2','Antpr3','Antpr4','Antpr5']
Block_Name=['Block1','Block2','Block3','Block4','Block5']
SMB_Analysis=['Antpr_B1_SCBAnalysis','Antpr_B2_SCBAnalysis','Antpr_B3_SCBAnalysis','Antpr_B4_SCBAnalysis','Antpr_B5_SCBAnalysis']
Output_File=['Antpr_B1_SCB_DailyCurrent','Antpr_B2_SCB_DailyCurrent','Antpr_B3_SCB_DailyCurrent','Antpr_B4_SCB_DailyCurrent','Antpr_B5_SCB_DailyCurrent']
Output_File1=['Antpr_B1_SCB_DailyRank','Antpr_B2_SCB_DailyRank','Antpr_B3_SCB_DailyRank','Antpr_B4_SCB_DailyRank','Antpr_B5_SCB_DailyRank']
Cloud_Output=['Antpr_B1_Cloud','Antpr_B2_Cloud','Antpr_B3_Cloud','Antpr_B4_Cloud','Antpr_B5_Cloud']
Critic_Output=['Antpr_B1_CriticalSCBCons','Antpr_B2_CriticalSCBCons','Antpr_B3_CriticalSCBCons','Antpr_B4_CriticalSCBCons','Antpr_B5_CriticalSCBCons']
indx=4  ### It is basically indicating the Block number i.e if it is a 2nd Block then indx value will  be '1'.

location_input='abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/Antpr_StaticData/Antpr_StaticData_SCB/'
location_output='abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/Antpr_Insights/Antpr_Insights_SCBFault/'
df = pd.read_parquet(location1)
# df = pd.read_csv('C:\\Users\\Lenovo\\Downloads\\abcd.csv')


tags=pd.read_excel("abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/Antpr_StaticData/Antpr_StaticData_Inverter/Antpr_OperationalTags_EDITED FOR B4 and B5 04Jul22.xlsx",sheet_name='SCB')
k_parameter=list(tags['Key_Parameters'].dropna())
tag=list(tags['Tags'].dropna())

df=df[df['itemname'].isin(tag)] 

df['Time']= df['ISTtime'].dt.strftime("%H:%M")
df=df[(df['Time'] >='06:00') & (df['Time']<='18:30')]

#df.drop(df.index[(df['itemname'] == 'ICR10..INV1.SCB_11') | (df['itemname'] == 'ICR10..INV1.SCB_12') ], inplace = True)
#df.to_parquet('C:\\Users\\Lenovo\\Downloads\\myfile.parquet')

New['Date_And_Time'] = pd.to_datetime(df['ISTtime']).dt.strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")
New['Tags']=df['itemname']
New['Value']=df['value']
# New.to_excel("C:\\Users\\Lenovo\\Desktop\\Man_Original.xlsx")
New=New.drop_duplicates(keep="last",inplace=False)
New = New.sort_values(by = 'Date_And_Time')
New.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)    
del New['index']

###############################################
df2=New.copy()
for i in df2['Tags'].unique():
    New1=df2[df2['Tags']==i]
    del New1['Tags']
    New1['Date_And_Time']=pd.to_datetime(New1['Date_And_Time'],errors='coerce')
    New1 = New1.sort_values(by = 'Date_And_Time')
    New1=New1.set_index('Date_And_Time',inplace=False)   # Converting the "Data_And_Time" column into index form, bcoz the math shouldn't apply for this column
    New1=New1.resample("5T").mean()          # Converting the 1 minute data into 10 minute data by taking the average of the all 10 minutes data & placing it in a single cell as one data
    New1.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)   
    New1['Tags']=i
    Frame=[dataframe,New1]
    dataframe=pd.concat(Frame,axis=0)
dataframe.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)   ### Resetting  Index 
del dataframe['index']

df2c=dataframe.copy()
df2c['Date']=df2c['Date_And_Time'].dt.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
df2c['Time']=df2c['Date_And_Time'].dt.strftime("%H:%M")
df2c["SPP"]="Ananthapur"


df2c["ICR"]=df2c["Tags"].apply(lambda x:x.split("..")[0])
df2c["INV"]=df2c["Tags"].apply(lambda x:x.split("..")[1].split('.')[0])
df2c["SCB"]=df2c["Tags"].apply(lambda x:x.split("..")[1].split('.')[1])

Blocklist=[]
for i in range(len(df2c)):
    if df2c.iloc[i,2].split("..")[0] in ["ICR8","ICR10","ICR12","ICR13"]:
        Blocklist.append("Antpr1")
    elif df2c.iloc[i,2].split("..")[0] in ["ICR16","ICR17","ICR18","ICR19"]:
        Blocklist.append("Antpr2")
    elif df2c.iloc[i,2].split("..")[0] in ["ICR1","ICR2","ICR3","ICR4"]:
        Blocklist.append("Antpr3")
    elif df2c.iloc[i,2].split("..")[0] in ["ICR11","ICR14","ICR15","ICR20","MCR"]:
        Blocklist.append("Antpr4")
    elif df2c.iloc[i,2].split("..")[0] in ["ICR5","ICR6","ICR7","ICR9"]:
        Blocklist.append("Antpr5")

df2c["Block"]=Blocklist

df2c=df2c[["Date","Time","SPP","Block","ICR","INV","SCB","Tags","Value"]]
ICR_dict={"ICR1":"ICR01",
         "ICR2":"ICR02",
         "ICR3":"ICR03",
         "ICR4":"ICR04",
         "ICR5":"ICR05",
         "ICR6":"ICR06",
         "ICR7":"ICR07",
         "ICR8":"ICR08",
         "ICR9":"ICR09"}
df2c["ICR"].replace(ICR_dict,inplace=True)
df2c.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)   ### Resetting  Index 
df2c=df2c[df2c['Tags'].isin(tag)]
New=df2c[["Date","Time","Block","Tags","Value"]]


index_number_K_parameter=New[New['Tags'].isin(k_parameter)].index
k_parameter_df=New.loc[index_number_K_parameter]
New=New.drop(index_number_K_parameter,axis=0)            ### Dropping the unwanted rows
New.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)  
del New['index']
        
wind_speed_tag=k_parameter_df[k_parameter_df['Tags']=="ICR1..WMS.WIND_SPEED"]
k_parameter_df=k_parameter_df[k_parameter_df['Block']=='Antpr5']
k_parameter_df=pd.concat([k_parameter_df,wind_speed_tag],axis=0)

k_parameter_df=k_parameter_df.pivot(
    index='Time',    # Column to use to make new frame’s index. If None, uses existing index.
    columns='Tags',  # Column to use to make new frame’s columns.
    values='Value'    # Column(s) to use for populating new frame’s values.
)

New.to_excel(location_output+"Antpr_B5_SCB_DailyRaw.xlsx",index=False)


#########################################################################################

New['Value']=New['Value'].fillna(0)

#########################################################################################

# for con in tag:
#     New1=New[New['Tags']==con]
#     print(con)
#     del New1['Tags']
#     New1['Date_And_Time']=pd.to_datetime(New1['Date_And_Time'],errors='coerce')
#     New1 = New1.sort_values(by = 'Date_And_Time')
#     New1=New1.set_index('Date_And_Time',inplace=False)   # Converting the "Data_And_Time" column into index form, bcoz the math shouldn't apply for this column
#     New1=New1.resample("5T").mean()          # Converting the 1 minute data into 10 minute data by taking the average of the all 10 minutes data & placing it in a single cell as one data

# dataframe.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)   ### Resetting  Index 
# del dataframe['index']   
# New=dataframe
# New1.to_excel("C:\\Users\\Lenovo\\Desktop\\Man.xlsx")

# New['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(New['Date_And_Time']).dt.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")

# New['Sitename']='Antpr'
# df.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)    
# del df['index']

# del Columns

# New=New.rename(columns ={2:"INV"})  
# New=New.rename(columns ={3:"SCB"})

# New['Char'] = New['Char'].replace(np.nan,'', regex=True)
# New['Char'] = New['Char'].replace([None],[''], regex=True)
# New['ICR']=New['Char']+New['Number']

# New['Number']=New['Number'].str.zfill(2)
# New['Number'] = New['Number'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['Number'] = New['Number'].replace([None],[''], regex=True)
# New['Char']=(New['INV'].str.extract(r"([A-Za-z_.]+)"))
# New['Char'] = New['Char'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['Char'] = New['Char'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
# New['INV']=New['Char']+New['Number']

# New['Number']=New['Number'].str.zfill(2)
# New['Number'] = New['Number'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['Number'] = New['Number'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
# New['Char']=(New['SCB'].str.extract(r"([A-Za-z_.]+)"))
# New['Char'] = New['Char'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['Char'] = New['Char'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
# New['SCB']=New['Char']+New['Number']
# del New['Char'],New['Number']

# New['ICR']=New['ICR'].replace([None],[''] , regex=True)
# New['INV']=New['INV'].replace([''],[None] , regex=True)
# New['SCB']=New['SCB'].replace([''],[None] , regex=True)

# New['Block1'] = New['ICR'].map(dict0)
# New['Block1'] = New['Block1'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['Block2'] = New['INV'].map(dict1)
# New['Block2'] = New['Block2'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['Block']=New['Block1']+New['Block2']
# del New['Block1'],New['Block2']

# New['ICR'] = New['ICR'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['ICR'] = New['ICR'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
# New['INV'] = New['INV'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['INV'] = New['INV'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
# New['SCB'] = New['SCB'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['SCB'] = New['SCB'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
# New['Block'] = New['Block'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
# New['Block'] = New['Block'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)


# New = New.reindex(columns=['Date_And_Time','Date','Time','Sitename','Block','Tags','ICR','INV','SCB','Value'])
# New.to_csv(location_output+"SCB_Raw.csv",index=False)
# Temp_df=New
# Columns=['Date','Time','Tags','Value']
# New= pd.DataFrame(New, columns=Columns)
Date=New.iloc[0,0]
New_df1=New.pivot(
    index='Time',    # Column to use to make new frame’s index. If None, uses existing index.
    columns='Tags',  # Column to use to make new frame’s columns.
    values='Value'    # Column(s) to use for populating new frame’s values.
)
New_df1['Date']=Date
tag.insert(0,'Date')
New_df1 = New_df1.reindex(columns=tag)
New_df1.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)   ### Resetting  Index 
KPI=''
Not_Working=[]
print(block[indx])
SMB_Analysis_File=pd.read_excel(location_input+str(SMB_Analysis[indx])+".xlsx")
cols=[]
Block_df=pd.DataFrame(columns=cols)
Block_df1=pd.DataFrame(columns=cols)
Block_List=pd.DataFrame(tags[Block_Name[indx]].dropna())
Block_List=Block_List.rename(columns ={Block_Name[indx]:"Tags"})
Block_df= pd.DataFrame(New_df1, columns=Block_List['Tags'])
Block_df=Block_df.rename(columns ={Block_List.loc[1,'Tags']:"GIR"})
if Block_df['GIR'].isna().all(0):
    print("\nError : All the GIR Values are Empty! for Block 5\n")
    sys.exit()
if Block_df['GIR'].isna().any():
    Block_df=Block_df['GIR'].fillna(0)
Not_Working=(Block_df.columns[Block_df.isna().all(0)])
Block_df=Block_df.drop(columns=Not_Working,axis=1)                 ### Dropping the unwanted columns
check_for_nan = Block_df.loc[:, Block_df.isna().any()]
check_for_nan=list(check_for_nan.columns)
if 'GIR' in check_for_nan: 
    check_for_nan.remove('GIR')
Block_df=Block_df.drop(columns=check_for_nan,axis=1)            ### Dropping the unwanted columns
Block_df=Block_df.replace(np.nan, 10)
Block_List=Block_List.drop([0,1],axis=0)            ### Dropping the unwanted columns
index_number=Block_List[Block_List['Tags'].isin(Not_Working)].index
Block_List=Block_List.drop(index_number,axis=0)            ### Dropping the unwanted rows
Block_List.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)
del Block_List['index']

index_number=Block_List[Block_List['Tags'].isin(check_for_nan)].index
Block_List=Block_List.drop(index_number,axis=0)            ### Dropping the unwanted rows
Block_List.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)  
del Block_List['index']

index_number=SMB_Analysis_File[SMB_Analysis_File['Tags'].isin(Not_Working)].index
mapping_df1=SMB_Analysis_File.loc[index_number]
SMB_Analysis_File=SMB_Analysis_File.drop(index_number,axis=0)            ### Dropping the unwanted rows
SMB_Analysis_File.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)
del SMB_Analysis_File['index']
dict_Not_Working=dict(zip((mapping_df1['Tags']),(mapping_df1['Block_Inverter_SMB'])))

index_number=SMB_Analysis_File[SMB_Analysis_File['Tags'].isin(check_for_nan)].index
mapping_df2=SMB_Analysis_File.loc[index_number]
SMB_Analysis_File=SMB_Analysis_File.drop(index_number,axis=0)            ### Dropping the unwanted rows
SMB_Analysis_File.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)
del SMB_Analysis_File['index']
dict_check_for_nan=dict(zip((mapping_df2['Tags']),(mapping_df2['Block_Inverter_SMB'])))


Columns=Block_List.Tags.str.split('.',expand=True)
Frame=[Block_df1,Columns]
Block_df1=pd.concat(Frame,axis=1)
if ((Block_df1.shape[0]>1) and (Block_df1.shape[1]>1)):
    Block_df1=Block_df1.rename(columns ={0:"ICR"})
    Block_df1=Block_df1.rename(columns ={2:"INV"})  
    Block_df1=Block_df1.rename(columns ={3:"SCB"})
    del Block_df1[1]
  
    Block_df1['Old_INV']=Block_df1['INV']
    Block_df1['Number']=Block_df1['ICR'].str.extract('(\d+)')
    Block_df1['Number']=Block_df1['Number'].str.zfill(2)
    Block_df1['Number'] = Block_df1['Number'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['Number'] = Block_df1['Number'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
    Block_df1['Char']=(Block_df1['ICR'].str.extract(r"([A-Za-z_.]+)"))
    Block_df1['Char'] = Block_df1['Char'].replace(np.nan,'', regex=True)
    Block_df1['Char'] = Block_df1['Char'].replace([None],[''], regex=True)
    Block_df1['ICR']=Block_df1['Char']+Block_df1['Number']
    
    Block_df1['INV']=Block_df1['ICR']+'_'+Block_df1['INV']
    Block_df1['INV']=Block_df1['INV'].replace('INV', '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['INV']=Block_df1['INV'].replace('ICR', 'I', regex=True)


    Block_df1['Number']=Block_df1['Old_INV'].str.extract('(\d+)')
    Block_df1['Number']=Block_df1['Number'].str.zfill(2)
    Block_df1['Number'] = Block_df1['Number'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['Number'] = Block_df1['Number'].replace([None],[''], regex=True)
    Block_df1['Char']=(Block_df1['Old_INV'].str.extract(r"([A-Za-z_.]+)"))
    Block_df1['Char'] = Block_df1['Char'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['Char'] = Block_df1['Char'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
    Block_df1['INV1']=Block_df1['Char']+Block_df1['Number']
    
    Block_df1['Number']=Block_df1['SCB'].str.extract('(\d+)')
    Block_df1['Number']=Block_df1['Number'].str.zfill(2)
    Block_df1['Number'] = Block_df1['Number'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['Number'] = Block_df1['Number'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
    Block_df1['Char']=(Block_df1['SCB'].str.extract(r"([A-Za-z_.]+)"))
    Block_df1['Char'] = Block_df1['Char'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['Char'] = Block_df1['Char'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
    Block_df1['SCB']=Block_df1['Char']+Block_df1['Number']
    del Block_df1['Char'],Block_df1['Number']
    
    Block_df1['ICR']=Block_df1['ICR'].replace([None],[''] , regex=True)
    Block_df1['INV']=Block_df1['INV'].replace([''],[None] , regex=True)
    Block_df1['SCB']=Block_df1['SCB'].replace([''],[None] , regex=True)
    
    Block_df1['Block1'] = Block_df1['ICR'].map(dict0)
    Block_df1['Block1'] = Block_df1['Block1'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['Block2'] = Block_df1['INV'].map(dict1)
    Block_df1['Block2'] = Block_df1['Block2'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['Block']=Block_df1['Block1']+Block_df1['Block2']
    del Block_df1['Block1'],Block_df1['Block2']
    
    Block_df1['ICR'] = Block_df1['ICR'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['ICR'] = Block_df1['ICR'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
    Block_df1['INV'] = Block_df1['INV'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['INV'] = Block_df1['INV'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
    Block_df1['SCB'] = Block_df1['SCB'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['SCB'] = Block_df1['SCB'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
    Block_df1['Block'] = Block_df1['Block'].replace(np.nan, '', regex=True)
    Block_df1['Block'] = Block_df1['Block'].replace([None], [''], regex=True)
  
    Block_df1['Date']=Date
    Icr_Inv_SCB=list(Block_df1['ICR']+'..'+Block_df1['INV1']+'.'+Block_df1['SCB'])
    del Block_df1['INV1'],Block_df1['Old_INV']
    
    Old_Coulmn_Name=Block_df.columns
    Appending_List=['Date','GIR']
    Icr_Inv_SCB_1=Appending_List+Icr_Inv_SCB
    Block_df.rename(columns={i:j for i,j in zip(Old_Coulmn_Name,Icr_Inv_SCB_1)}, inplace=True)
    Block_df = Block_df.sort_index(ascending=True, axis=1)
    Time_List=New_df1['Time']
    New_Coulmn=['Date','Block','ICR','INV','SCB','Block_Inverter_SCB','Total_SCB_Current',
                'Deviation_wrt_R1_Block_df1','Eff_String','Total_String_Current','Deviation_All',
                'OverAll_Block_df1_Eff_Rank','Ideal_Current','Current_At_Max_GIR','Ideal_Current_At_Max_GIR',
                'Delta','Rank_Delta','Rank_Day_Peak','Rank_Ranked_Day_Peak']
    Block_df1 = Block_df1.reindex(columns=New_Coulmn)
    Block_df.insert(1, "Time", Time_List)
    Block_df1['Block_Inverter_SCB']=Icr_Inv_SCB
    Block_df1 = Block_df1.sort_values(by = 'Block_Inverter_SCB')
    index_number=Block_df1[Block_df1['Block_Inverter_SCB'].isin(Not_Working)].index
    Block_df1=Block_df1.drop(index_number,axis=0)          ### Dropping the unwanted columns
    Block_df1.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)  
    del Block_df1['index']
    index_number=Block_df1[Block_df1['Block_Inverter_SCB'].isin(check_for_nan)].index
    Block_df1=Block_df1.drop(index_number,axis=0)          ### Dropping the unwanted columns
    Block_df1.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)  
    del Block_df1['index']
    GIR_List=list(Block_df['GIR'])
    Sum=list(Block_df.sum())
    Sum.pop(0)      ### Popping the sum of the column Date,Time and GIR value from total Sum
    Sum.pop(0)
    Sum.pop(0)
    Block_df1['Total_SCB_Current']=Sum
    Block_df1['Deviation_wrt_R1_Block_df1']=(Block_df1['Total_SCB_Current']-(Block_df1['Total_SCB_Current'].max()))/(Block_df1['Total_SCB_Current'].max())
    Curr_Per_String=Sum/SMB_Analysis_File['Effective_Strings']       
    a = np.array(GIR_List)
    Max_Value_Index = np.argmax(a)
    Max_Value=GIR_List[Max_Value_Index]
    def calculate_rank(Curr_Per_String):                                    ### This "for" loop is used to calculate the rank based on Curr_Per_String & stores it in a list & returns
        a={}
        rank=1
        for num in sorted(Curr_Per_String, reverse=True):
            if num not in a:
                a[num]=rank
                rank=rank+1
        return[a[i] for i in  Curr_Per_String]
    Rank1=calculate_rank(Curr_Per_String)   
    Block_df1['Eff_String']=SMB_Analysis_File['Effective_Strings']
    Block_df1["Total_String_Current"]=Block_df1['Total_SCB_Current']/Block_df1['Eff_String']
    Block_df1['Deviation_All']=(Block_df1["Total_String_Current"]-Block_df1["Total_String_Current"].max())/Block_df1["Total_String_Current"].max()
    Block_df1['OverAll_Block_df1_Eff_Rank']=Rank1
    Block_df1['Ideal_Current']=SMB_Analysis_File['Ideal_Current']
    Block_df1['Current_At_Max_GIR']=list(Block_df.iloc[Max_Value_Index,3:])
    Block_df1['Ideal_Current_At_Max_GIR']=(Block_df1['Ideal_Current']/1000)*Max_Value
    Block_df1['Delta']=Block_df1['Current_At_Max_GIR']-Block_df1['Ideal_Current_At_Max_GIR']
    Block_df1['Rank_Delta']=Block_df1.groupby('Date')['Delta'].rank(ascending=False)
    Block_df1['Rank_Day_Peak']=Block_df1['Rank_Delta']*Block_df1['OverAll_Block_df1_Eff_Rank']   
    
    Rank2=[]
    rank_list=Block_df1['Rank_Day_Peak']
    def calculate_rank1(rank_list): ### This "for" loop is used to calculate the rank based on sum_of_cols & stores it in a list & returns
        a={}
        rank=1
        for num in sorted(rank_list, reverse=False):
            if num not in a:
                a[num]=rank
                rank=rank+1
        return[a[i] for i in  rank_list]
    Rank2=calculate_rank1(rank_list)
    Block_df1['Rank_Ranked_Day_Peak']=Rank2
    Block_df1.to_excel(location_output+str(Output_File[indx])+".xlsx",index=False)
    Block_df.to_excel(location_output+str(Output_File1[indx])+".xlsx",index=False)

    Dup=Block_df1
    Dup.sort_values("Rank_Ranked_Day_Peak", axis = 0, ascending = False,inplace = True)
    Dup.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)
    Comparision=pd.read_excel(location_input+"Antpr_Check.xlsx",sheet_name=0,header=0)
    Comparision_Per=(Comparision.loc[0,'Percentage_of_Critical_SMB'])/100
    High_Value=Dup.loc[0,'Rank_Ranked_Day_Peak']
    Low_Value=Dup.loc[Dup['Rank_Ranked_Day_Peak'].count()-1,'Rank_Ranked_Day_Peak']
    RESULT=High_Value-Low_Value
    RESULT=RESULT*Comparision_Per
    Final_Val=High_Value-RESULT
    
    Lossing=[]
    Loss_str=[]
    for g in range(Block_df1['Rank_Ranked_Day_Peak'].count()):
        if Block_df1.loc[g,'Rank_Ranked_Day_Peak']>Final_Val:
            Lossing.append(Block_df1.loc[g,'Block_Inverter_SCB'])
            Loss_str+=str(Block_df1.loc[g,'Block_Inverter_SCB'])+'\n\n'
    if Path(location_output+str(Critic_Output[indx])+'.xlsx').is_file():
        Critic=pd.read_excel(location_output+str(Critic_Output[indx])+".xlsx")         ### If File is present, reading the that file into a dataframe
    else:
        cols=['Date','Block_Inverter_SMB','FieldSCBName']
        Critic= pd.DataFrame(columns = cols)                             ### If File is not present, Create a new dataframe by above columns
    
    index_number=SMB_Analysis_File[SMB_Analysis_File['Tags_Acc_Output'].isin(Lossing)].index
    mapping_df2=SMB_Analysis_File.loc[index_number]
    dict_Lossing=dict(zip((mapping_df2['Tags_Acc_Output']),(mapping_df2['Block_Inverter_SMB'])))
    Lossing1 = list([dict_Lossing[key] for key in Lossing])
    
    for c in range(len(Lossing)):
        Critic.loc[len(Critic)]=[Date,Lossing[c],Lossing1[c]]
    Critic.to_excel(location_output+str(Critic_Output[indx])+'.xlsx',index=False)

    
                            ####################### Cloud Computing #########################
    Rad=[]
    Rad1=[]
    Std_gir=[]
    for j in range(Block_df['GIR'].count()):
        Rad.append(Block_df.loc[j,'GIR'])
        if(Rad[j]==0):
            Rad[j]=1
    row_no1=0
    row_no2=0
    for i in range(len(Rad)):
        if Rad[i]>=820:
            row_no1=i
            break;
    for i in reversed(Rad):
        Rad1.append(i)
    for i in range(len(Rad1)):
        if Rad1[i]>=820:
            row_no2=(len(Rad1)-i)-2
            break;
    Cloud['Date']=Block_df['Date']
    Cloud['Time']=Block_df['Time']
    Cloud['GIR']=Block_df['GIR']
    for ind in range(Block_df['GIR'].count()):
        Std_gir.append((Block_df.loc[ind,'GIR']-Block_df['GIR'].mean())/Block_df['GIR'].std())
    inv1=1
    blk1=1
    smb1=1
    qwer=0
    cld=[0]
    for index in range(len(Block_df.count())):   
        if(index>2):
            qwer+=1
            std_curr=[]
            curr=[]
            Rad1=[]
            curr1=[]
            Rad2=[]
            curr2=[]
            Delta=[]
            cld1=[]
            cld2=[]
            cld3=[]
            cld4=[]
            cld5=[]  
            for oi in range(Block_df['GIR'].count()):    
                std_curr.append((Block_df.iloc[oi,index]-Block_df.iloc[:,index].mean())/Block_df.iloc[:,index].std())
                curr.append(Block_df.iloc[oi,index])
                if(curr[oi]==0):
                    curr[oi]=1
            for io in range(len(Rad)-1):
                Rad1.append(((Rad[io+1]-Rad[io])/Rad[io+1])*100)
                curr1.append(((curr[io+1]-curr[io])/curr[io+1])*100)
                Delta.append(curr1[io]-Rad1[io])
            for io in range(len(Delta)):
                if Delta[io]<Comparision.loc[0,'Percentage_of_Cloud_Difference']: 
                    cld1.append(1)
                else:
                    cld1.append(0)
                Rad2.append((Rad[io]-Rad[io+1]))
                curr2.append((curr[io]-curr[io+1]))
            if row_no2!=0:
                for iop in range(row_no2+1):
                    if(Rad2[iop]>0 and curr2[iop]>0): 
                        cld2.append(1)
                    else:
                        cld2.append(0)
                for poi in range(len(Rad2)):
                    if poi>row_no2:
                        if(Rad2[poi]<0 and curr2[poi]<0):
                            cld2.append(1)
                        else:
                            cld2.append(0)
            else:
                 for iop in range(len(Rad2)):
                    if(Rad2[iop]>0 and curr2[iop]>0): 
                        cld2.append(1)
                    else:
                        cld2.append(0)
            for uio in range(len(cld1)):
                if(cld1[uio]==1 or cld2[uio]==1):
                    cld3.append(1)
                else:
                    cld3.append(0)
            if row_no2!=0:
                for oiu in range(len(cld3)):
                    if oiu>=row_no1 and oiu<=row_no2:
                        if Std_gir[oiu]<Std_gir[row_no1] and std_curr[oiu]<std_curr[row_no1]:
                            cld4.append(1)
                        else:
                            cld4.append(0)
                    else:
                        cld4.append(0)               
                cld4.pop(0)
                cld4=cld4+cld
            if row_no2!=0:           
                for iu in range(len(cld3)):
                    if(cld3[iu]==1 or cld4[iu]==1):
                        cld5.append(1)
                    else:
                        cld5.append(0)
            else:
                cld5=cld3
            str123=Block_df.columns[index]
            cld5=cld+cld5
            Cloud[str123]=cld5
    Cloud.to_excel(location_output+str(Cloud_Output[indx])+".xlsx",index=False)
    Min_row=Max_Value_Index-6
    Max_row=Max_Value_Index+6
    Sum1=[]
    for c in range(len(Lossing)):
        Total=0
        for ind in range(Min_row,Max_row+1):
            Total+=Cloud.loc[ind,Lossing[c]]
        Sum1.append(Total)
    a = np.array(Sum1)
    Min_Value_Index = np.argmin(a)
    Min_Value=Sum1[Min_Value_Index]
    
    index_number=SMB_Analysis_File[SMB_Analysis_File['Tags_Acc_Output'].isin(Lossing)].index
    mapping_df2=SMB_Analysis_File.loc[index_number]
    dict_Lossing=dict(zip((mapping_df2['Tags_Acc_Output']),(mapping_df2['Block_Inverter_SMB'])))
    Lossing = list([dict_Lossing[key] for key in Lossing])

    Loss_Str=''
    for i in range(len(Lossing)):
        if i==0 and Min_Value_Index==0:
            Loss_Str+=str(Lossing[i])+u"\u26A0"+''+u"\u26C5"+"\n\n"
        elif i==Min_Value_Index:
            Loss_Str+=str(Lossing[i])+u"\u26C5"+"\n\n"
        elif i==0:
            Loss_Str+=str(Lossing[i])+u"\u26A0"+"\n\n"                                         
        else:
            Loss_Str+=str(Lossing[i])+"\n\n"
    # print(Loss_Str)
    
    renaming_dict=dict(zip((tags['Key_Parameters'].dropna()),(tags['Key_Parameters_Rename'].dropna()))) ### Dict for renaming all the key parameters like 'Tmod' and 'WS' etc from its tag name into easy namespace.
    for (key,value) in renaming_dict.items():
        k_parameter_df=k_parameter_df.rename(columns ={key:value})
    
    k_parameter_df.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)  
    del k_parameter_df['Time']
    
    Block_df=k_parameter_df.join(Block_df)
    Block_df.insert(0, 'Date', Block_df.pop('Date'))
    Block_df.insert(1, 'Time', Block_df.pop('Time'))
    Block_df.insert(2, 'GIR', Block_df.pop('GIR'))
    Block_df.to_excel(location_output+str(Output_File1[indx])+".xlsx",index=False)

    comm_error=''
    if len(Not_Working)>0 or len(check_for_nan)>0 :
        Not_Working = list([dict_Not_Working[key] for key in Not_Working])
        check_for_nan = list([dict_check_for_nan[key] for key in check_for_nan])
        comm_error='Communication Error:\n\n'
        for comm in range(len(Not_Working)):
            comm_error+=''.join(Not_Working[comm])+'\n\n'
        for comm in range(len(check_for_nan)):
            comm_error+=''.join(check_for_nan[comm])+'  !!\n\n'
        KPI='***'+block[indx]+': '+str(Date)+'***\n\n'+comm_error+'Faulty SMBs:\n\n'+Loss_Str+'\n\n'
    else:
        KPI='**'+block[indx]+': '+str(Date)+'**\n\nFaulty SMBs:\n\n'+Loss_Str+'\n\n'
    def sms():
        import pymsteams
        myTeamsMessage = pymsteams.connectorcard("https://ayanapower.webhook.office.com/webhookb2/c5319b3c-6028-485d-b781-f8e7d0ade630@59b60474-e282-44b5-881c-bb9ce815690c/IncomingWebhook/392a9ff6cea64fa0b1a486f727545e39/0a64ab19-2984-4746-9447-21882231bb32")
        myTeamsMessage.text(KPI)
        myTeamsMessage.send()
    sms()
    print(KPI)
else:
